imdb.plot outline: Way of the Warrior is a reality TV show which takes a group of men who have become overweight and unhealthy couch-potatoes - men who have lost their drive and momentum and are looking for a way back on to the path of mental and physical health...and through the transformative power of Martial Arts, turns them into lean, healthy, formidable fighting machines. Way of the Warrior is not for the faint-hearted!
imdb.title: Way of the Warrior
plot: _Way of the Warrior_ (qv) is a reality TV show which takes a group of men who have become overweight and unhealthy couch-potatoes - men who have lost their drive and momentum and are looking for a way back on to the path of mental and physical health...and through the transformative power of Martial Arts, turns them into lean, healthy, formidable fighting machines. _Way of the Warrior_ (qv) is not for the faint-hearted!
